title: Should you wear a face mask?
description: Do face masks stop you getting coronavirus? You might instinctively think that covering your mouth and nose with cloth must offer protection from Covid-19. And some health authorities around the world say people should make their own masks. But expert opinion is divided. Tim Harford and Ruth Alexander unpick the arguments.
itunes:subtitle: Tim Harford looks at the debate over making your own Covid-19 protection.
